title: Multiple Choice Activity
description: Schema for a multiple-choice question activity.

options.description: The list of choices available for the question.

id.description: A unique identifier for the option.

text.description: The display text for the option.

allowMultipleAnswers.description: Whether the user can select more than one option.

correctOptionId.description: The ID(s) of the correct option(s). Can be a single ID or an array of IDs if multiple answers are allowed.
